name: GetRelatedOrderLines
description:
List all the related orderlines for the given OrderLineID.

The orderlines will be sorted by CreationTime.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

B.name: OrderLineID
B.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

E.name: ExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

E.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
E.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

E.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

J.name: DateTimeValue
J.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

J.name: NumberValue
J.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

J.name: StringValue
J.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

K.name: DiscountID
K.description: This is the ID of a `Discount`

M.name: LoyaltyProgramID
M.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgram`

O.name: BackendID
O.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

O.name: ID
O.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

O.name: Status
O.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - PreRelease
* `4` - DeliveryOnly
* `8` - DisableDelivery
* `16` - DisablePickup
* `32` - DisableBackorder
* `34` - UseUp
* `64` - NonSellable

O.name: Type
O.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Stock
* `2` - Insurance
* `4` - Marketing
* `8` - GiftCard
* `16` - Service
* `32` - GreetingCard
* `64` - CustomPricing
* `128` - External
* `256` - OrderCosts
* `512` - SystemGenerated
* `1024` - ProductSet
* `2048` - BundleProduct
* `4096` - VirtualProduct
* `8192` - MadeToOrder
* `16384` - Configurable
* `32768` - SupplierProduct
* `65536` - Template
* `131072` - SecondChance
* `262144` - NotReturnable

N.name: Type
N.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Stock
* `2` - Insurance
* `4` - Marketing
* `8` - GiftCard
* `16` - Service
* `32` - GreetingCard
* `64` - CustomPricing
* `128` - External
* `256` - OrderCosts
* `512` - SystemGenerated
* `1024` - ProductSet
* `2048` - BundleProduct
* `4096` - VirtualProduct
* `8192` - MadeToOrder
* `16384` - Configurable
* `32768` - SupplierProduct
* `65536` - Template
* `131072` - SecondChance
* `262144` - NotReturnable

U.name: ID
U.description: This is the ID of a `RefundCorrectionReason`

V.name: Name
V.description: Usually an internal & unchangable code - for display, use `Description`

W.name: DeliveryType
W.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Default
* `2` - ShipFromStore
* `4` - Interbranch

Y.name: Name
Y.description: Usually an internal & unchangable code - for display, use `Description`

G.name: AvailabilityStatus
G.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Unknown
* `5` - Blocked
* `10` - CannotFulfill
* `12` - CannotFulfillOnTime
* `15` - CanFulfill

G.name: BackendReference
G.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

G.name: CommitmentStatus
G.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Uncommitted
* `1` - SoftCommit
* `2` - HardCommit
* `5` - ManualCommit
* `10` - ForcedCommit

G.name: CreatedByID

G.name: ExternalModificationStatus
G.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - CancellationRequested
* `2` - QuantityChangeRequested
* `4` - CancellationRequestDenied
* `8` - CancellationRequestApproved
* `16` - QuantityChangeRequestDenied
* `32` - QuantityChangeRequestApproved

G.name: FulfillmentStatus
G.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - None
* `300` - WaitingForStock
* `400` - Pending
* `500` - InProgress
* `800` - Cancelled
* `1000` - Completed

* `1` - SerialNumberValidationRequired
